tldr: Affected versions of this package are vulnerable to Cross-site Scripting (XSS) due to improper escaping of values passed to the `stx` tagged template literal. This flaw allows attackers to inject malicious scripts, potentially compromising the security of the application and its users.
doest_this_affect_me: You are affected if you are using a version that falls within the vulnerable range.
how_to_fix: Upgrade the `strophe.js` library to the patch version.
